title: Oceanic Open Ladder Split 2 details have been announced!

embed.description: Split two of the Oceanic Open Ladder consists of four ladders and a wildcard tournament! Participate in the ACL, OCE Weekly, Cyber Gamer or Ranked 5's ladder. Pick the tournaments that suit your teams schedule, if your team does well you will earn Riot Point prizes and one of five spots in the Oceanic Challenger Series.

body:
Looking to qualify for the next Oceanic Challenger Series? 

The Oceanic Challenger Series will be held on the 30th of June with each team receiving cash prizes (and the top teams given a chance to qualify for the OPL)!

1st - $3500
2nd - 8th - $1000
*prizes are per team

If you think you have what it takes get your team together and join split 2 of the Oceanic Open Ladder! Full details below;

http://oce.lolesports.com/leagues/oceanic-open-ladder

If you have any questions feel free to leave a comment below! (but make sure you read the FAQ first)

http://i.imgur.com/pWl9Y3i.jpg
